name: Sonic Treading Power
storyline:
One day, some Chao were playing games in a computer lab. Suddenly, the power goes out! Luckily, the lights and other essentials are on a backup power generator... But the computers and lab equipment aren't fully powered, and the Chao still want to play games...

Sonic and his friends want to help the Chao. Tails quickly brings over some tools and gets to work. He puts together a treadmill that can generate power and connects it to the computers and lab equipment.
